StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetXmlOso369MonthSummary]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SelectedIDs xml
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
declare @isToUseTrainingFileID bit;
IF @SelectedIDs IS NOT null BEGIN
SET @isToUseTrainingFileID = @SelectedIDs.exist('/IDs/TrainingFileID')
if @isToUseTrainingFileID = 0 -- sign a few eval tasks only BEGIN DECLARE @IDTable TABLE (ID uniqueidentifier)
INSERT INTO @IDTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(36)') FROM @SelectedIDs.nodes('IDs/ID') as ParamValues(ID)
SELECT ms.ID ,Mul.MonthSummaryID ,MonthIncrement ,SignatureID AS 'Signature/SignatureID' ,U1.FirstName AS 'Signature/SignatureFirstName' ,U1.MiddleName AS 'Signature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U1.LastName AS 'Signature/SignatureLastName' ,Comments ,Es.matedDate ,CommandGroupMemberSignatureDate ,CommandGroupMemberSignatureID AS 'CommandGroupMemberSignature/SignatureID' ,U2.FirstName AS 'CommandGroupMemberSignature/SignatureFirstName' ,U2.MiddleName AS 'CommandGroupMemberSignature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U2.LastName AS 'CommandGroupMemberSignature/SignatureLastName' ,COSignatureID AS 'COSignature/SignatureID' ,U3.FirstName AS 'COSignature/SignatureFirstName' ,U3.MiddleName AS 'COSignature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U3.LastName AS 'COSignature/SignatureLastName' ,SentToDistrictDate ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy ,Name ,Rank ,( SELECT da.ID ,MonthSummaryID ,Name ,Mastery ,TrainingRequired ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy FROM USMC.MonthDutyAreaList da WHERE da.MonthSummaryID = ms.ID ORDER BY RIGHT(da.Name, 4) FOR XML PATH('DutyAreaTask'), TYPE, ELEMENTS XSINIL ) AS DutyAreaTasks FROM USMC.MonthSummary ms LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U1 ON U1.UserID = ms.SignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U2 ON U2.UserID = ms.CommandGroupMemberSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U3 ON U3.UserID = ms.COSignatureID WHERE ms.ID IN (SELECT * FROM @IDTable) ORDER BY MonthIncrement
FOR XML PATH('MonthlySummary'), root('MonthlySummary-OSO-369-MonthlySummaries'), ELEMENTS XSINIL
END ELSE -- trainingFileID is provided. whole eval is being signed BEGIN DECLARE @TrainingFileIDTable TABLE (ID uniqueidentifier)
INSERT INTO @TrainingFileIDTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(36)') FROM @SelectedIDs.nodes('IDs/TrainingFileID') as ParamValues(ID)
SELECT mms.ID ,Evalua.onTypeID ,et.Name AS EvalTypeName ,TrainingFileID ,ParDate ,CompleteDate ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy
,(SELECT ms.ID ,Mul.MonthSummaryID ,MonthIncrement ,SignatureID AS 'Signature/SignatureID' ,U1.FirstName AS 'Signature/SignatureFirstName' ,U1.MiddleName AS 'Signature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U1.LastName AS 'Signature/SignatureLastName' ,Comments ,Es.matedDate ,CommandGroupMemberSignatureDate ,CommandGroupMemberSignatureID AS 'CommandGroupMemberSignature/SignatureID' ,U2.FirstName AS 'CommandGroupMemberSignature/SignatureFirstName' ,U2.MiddleName AS 'CommandGroupMemberSignature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U2.LastName AS 'CommandGroupMemberSignature/SignatureLastName' ,COSignatureID AS 'COSignature/SignatureID' ,U3.FirstName AS 'COSignature/SignatureFirstName' ,U3.MiddleName AS 'COSignature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U3.LastName AS 'COSignature/SignatureLastName' ,SentToDistrictDate ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy ,Name ,Rank ,( SELECT da.ID ,MonthSummaryID ,Name ,Mastery ,TrainingRequired ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy FROM USMC.MonthDutyAreaList da WHERE da.MonthSummaryID = ms.ID ORDER BY RIGHT(da.Name, 4) FOR XML PATH('DutyAreaTask'), TYPE, ELEMENTS XSINIL ) AS DutyAreaTasks FROM USMC.MonthSummary ms LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U1 ON U1.UserID = ms.SignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U2 ON U2.UserID = ms.CommandGroupMemberSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U3 ON U3.UserID = ms.COSignatureID WHERE ms.Mul.MonthSummaryID = mms.ID ORDER BY MonthIncrement FOR XML PATH('MonthlySummary'), TYPE, ELEMENTS XSINIL ) AS MonthlySummaries
,( SELECT s.Date, s.Mission FROM USMC.MonthMissionSummary s WHERE mms.ID=s.Mul.MonthSummaryID AND s.Date BETWEEN DATEADD(month, 2, mms.ParDate) AND DATEADD(month, 11, mms.ParDate) ORDER BY s.Date FOR XML PATH('Mission'), TYPE, ELEMENTS XSINIL ) As MissionSummaries FROM USMC.Mul.MonthSummary mms INNER JOIN USMC.Evalua.onType et ON mms.Evalua.onTypeID=et.ID WHERE
TrainingFileID IN (SELECT * FROM @TrainingFileIDTable)
FOR XML PATH ('MonthSummary-OSO-369'), root('MonthSummary-OSO-369s'), ELEMENTS XSINIL
END END
END
